# `polars count-null` for [dataframe](/commands/categories/dataframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>Counts null values.</div>

## Signature

```> polars count-null {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Counts null values
```nu
> let s = ([1 1 0 0 3 3 4] | polars into-df);
    ($s / $s) | polars count-null
╭───┬────────────╮
│ # │ count_null │
├───┼────────────┤
│ 0 │          2 │
╰───┴────────────╯

```
